poemsDataJson.list_full: 人(ひと)もをし 人(ひと)も恨(うら)めし あぢきなく 世(よ)を思(おも)ふゆゑに もの思(おも)ふ身(み)は
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: For some men I grieve;//Some men are hateful to me;//And this wretched world//To me, with all my sadness,//Is a place of misery.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Hito mo oshi|Hito mo urameshi|Ajiki naku|Yo o omou yue ni|Mono omou mi wa
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: よをおもふゆゑに ものおもふみは
poemsDataJson.author: 後鳥羽院(ごとばいん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 愛憎が交錯し、思い悩みつつ世に生きる身の嘆き
